description.value:
As a Full Action can make +0 Willpower Test targeting an unsecured metal object within 20m that has a mass no more than 1kg x WP Bonus. Success immediately pulls object to user's hand.

Requirements

Requires Mechanicus Implants.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
description.summary: As a Full Action can make +0 Willpower Test targeting an unsecured metal object within 20m that has a mass no more than 1kg x WP Bonus. Success immediately pulls object to user's hand.
